alert.note: Alert for El Paso; Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 6:42PM MDT until July 07 at 7:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern El Paso County in east central Colorado... Northeastern Pueblo County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 715 PM MDT. * At 642 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southwest of Hanover, or 19 miles north of Pueblo, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern El Paso and northeastern Pueblo Counties. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
